localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit

nodes.excerpt: Help your friends get a job by embedding a widget on your website where you point visitors to your friends for jobs that you're not available for. Create your widget in the online generator and embed it on your website using an iframe. It's as simple as that.

nodes.excerpt: Meteostat is a meteorological database which provides historical weather and climate data for thousands of weather stations and places worldwide. The project features a convenient web app and data interfaces for developers.

nodes.excerpt: Write concisely by substituting "very" + "adjective" with a more concise adjective that has the spirit of very contained within it.
